text: (nabiye!) tama deviyange suddha vu somnasa taka ude savasa prarthana karamin sitinnanva oba elava nodamanu. ovunge gananayen kisivak obage vagakimak vanne næta. obage gananayen kisivak ovunge vagakimak vanneda næta. ebævin oba ovunva elavuvahot obat aparadhakaruvangen keneku bavata pat vannehiya
